mapper.select: SELECT * FROM department_tbl ORDER BY d_code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO department_tbl ( d_code, d_name, d_tel, d_address, d_manager ) VALUES ( #{d_code}, #{d_name}, #{d_tel}, #{d_address}, #{d_manager} )
mapper.update: UPDATE department_tbl SET d_name = #{d_name}, d_tel = #{d_tel}, d_address = #{d_address}, d_manager = #{d_manager} WHERE d_code = #{d_code}
